in_ports.name: input
in_ports.hint:
Some matrix, containing pattern shape (usually binary).
Should be single-channel, in other case it is automatically converted to grayscale.

out_ports.name: shape_specification
out_ports.caption: shape specification
out_ports.hint:
Multiline string, containing numeric values of all pixels of the source matrix, separated by spaces.
Rows of the matrix are separated by \n.

controls.caption: Invert
controls.name: invert
controls.description: If true, the source matrix is inverted, i.e. every element v is replaced with max−v. where "max" corresponds to white color (1.0 for floating-point matrices, 255 for byte, 65535 for short, 2³¹−1 for int type).
